misc: Has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades.
biography: Mikko is a highly accomplished golfer whose career has been marked by consistent excellence and unwavering dedication to the sport. Hailing from Lakeside Golf Vammala, Mikko's journey in competitive golf has taken him to various prestigious events, notably his consistent participation in the annual Hector Trophée invitational tournament since 2022.

Mikko's participation in the Hector Trophée has showcased his exceptional skills and strategic prowess on the course. While he has yet to claim the coveted Hector Trophée or Victor trophy, his persistent presence in the tournament speaks volumes about his determination and golfing ability.  His performances have demonstrated a player who is both technically gifted and mentally resilient, traits crucial for success at this level.

Beyond his competitive achievements, Mikko is known for his quiet intensity and dedication to the game. He is a player who consistently works on improving his game, constantly seeking ways to elevate his performance.  His deep understanding of the nuances of golf has led to a consistently strong competitive record, one which is expected to continue to improve in the years to come.
